casebody.data:
In the Matter of K.M. appealed by Respondent, Cedric S. No. 261P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006. Peter Wood, for Cedric S. Antoan Whidbee, Smithfield, for Gwendolyn Mayo. Jennifer O'Connor, Raleigh, for Johnston County DSS. James D. Johnson, for Guardian ad Litem.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th day of May 2006 by Respondent (Cedric S.) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 29th day of June 2006."
